channel.title: RuneDays || PURE 718 || Custom Item's || ECO || 24/7 || BETA
channel.description:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/2yum3gs3zoz7yra/RuneDaysUser.jar?m]RuneDays Client[/url] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://RuneDays.tk]Forums[/url]
[b][u]What do we have for YOU?[/u][/b]
RuneDays is a new server that has just opened up, If you love ECO and old armours and bosses and PvM with a great community than this server is JUST FOR YOU
The owner Century (ME) Accepts EVERY suggestion given to him, please do not be afraid of suggesting anything to do with the server, I'll happily work on it.
[b][u]CONTENT[/u][/b]
- Perfect combat formula for Melee, Range and Magic - Constant Updates - 24/7 - No lag - Stable Economy - Runescape Armour Switching (OLD and NEW) - Custom Dungeoneering - Crystal Chest - Donator's Zone (working on it) - Friendly staff. - All the GodWars Dungeons (INCLUDING NEX). - ALL PRAYERS - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Working Flowers and Dicing - MOST skill's working (AS IT'S BETA) - Awesome and UNIQUE Home - Perfect switching - Loyalty point system with shop - Lots of shops. - Squeal of fortune (WITH FIXED INTERFACE). - & So much more!
[b][u]PICTURES[/u][/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cLFX61j.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/myqOb2v.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r5DMnYM.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BxjfNvc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vrCRaiY.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xINljIK.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R5W3SGF.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/977JIq8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DeaVduo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ndJnV1u.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dRZeMUY.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LGz4yTC.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2Uq4bSR.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1YRJG1y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Is1syOR.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SQKvDdK.jpg[/img]
Thank you for having a look at this thread and hope to see you ingame

@RuneDaysRSPS wrote:

RuneDays Client
Forums

What do we have for YOU?

RuneDays is a new server that has just opened up, If you love ECO and old armours and bosses and PvM with a great community than this server is JUST FOR YOU

The owner Century (ME) Accepts EVERY suggestion given to him, please do not be afraid of suggesting anything to do with the server, I’ll happily work on it.

CONTENT

  • Perfect combat formula for Melee, Range and Magic
  • Constant Updates
  • 24/7
  • No lag
  • Stable Economy
  • Runescape Armour Switching (OLD and NEW)
  • Custom Dungeoneering
  • Crystal Chest
  • Donator’s Zone (working on it)
  • Friendly staff.
  • All the GodWars Dungeons (INCLUDING NEX).
  • ALL PRAYERS
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Caves
  • Working Flowers and Dicing
  • MOST skill’s working (AS IT’S BETA)
  • Awesome and UNIQUE Home
  • Perfect switching
  • Loyalty point system with shop
  • Lots of shops.
  • Squeal of fortune (WITH FIXED INTERFACE).
  • & So much more!
